dir.content: dir → tdu.Position : Get or set the direction of the camera as a vector that points towards the target. Up is considered to be (0,1,0).

pivot.content: pivot → tdu.Position : Get or set the 3D point in space where the camera will pivot around or towards.

position.content: position → tdu.Position : Get or set the 3D point in space where the camera is located.

blendCamera.content:
blendCamera(targetCamera, blendFactor)→ tdu.Camera: Returns a camera that is blended with the given camera using the blendFactor. The camera position is blended using linear interpolation, while the rotation is blended using spherical linear interpolation.
targetCamera - A second camera that is the blend target.
blendfactor - A blend value between 0 and 1."

dolly.content: dolly()→ None: Move the camera away or towards the pivot point.

frameBounds.content: frameBounds()→ OrthoWidth: Set the camera to frame the given bounding box. Returns the width of the framed scene that can be used when setting up orthographic projections.

look.content: look()→ None: Pivot the camera around its position.

move3D.content: move3D()→ None: Move the camera using data from a 3D mouse.

pan.content: pan()→ None: Pan the camera in a 2D plane facing the pivot point.

setTransform.content: setTransform()→ None: Set the camera view matrix.

track.content: track()→ None: Move the camera up/down in the Y-Axis or left/right.

transform.content: transform()→ None: Get the camera view matrix.

tumble.content: tumble()→ None: Rotate the camera around the pivot point.

walk.content:
